### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE text_messages (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sender TEXT,
   receiver TEXT,
   message_text TEXT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP);


CREATE TABLE multimedia_content (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   title TEXT,
   content_type TEXT,
   content_url TEXT,
   upload_date TIMESTAMP);


CREATE TABLE message_attachments (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   message_id INT,
   attachment_type TEXT,
   attachment_url TEXT);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE text_messages SET sender = 'John' WHERE id = 1;
